original_text: In your dream, you saw a holy angel who came down from heaven. He said, “Cut down the tree and destroy it. But leave the base of the tree and its roots in the ground. Tie iron and bronze round it. Then leave it in the grass. Make him wet with dew from the sky. Cause him to live in the fields with the wild animals for seven years.”
korean_text: 왕이 보신즉 한 순찰자, 한 거룩한 자가 하늘에서 내려와서 이르기를 그 나무를 베어 없애라 그러나 그 뿌리의 그루터기는 땅에 남겨 두고 쇠와 놋줄로 동이고 그것을 들 풀 가운데에 두라 그것이 하늘 이슬에 젖고 또 들짐승들과 더불어 제 몫을 얻으며 일곱 때를 지내리라 하였나이다

sentences.original_text: In your dream, you saw a holy angel
sentences.korean_translation: 네 꿈에서 너는 거룩한 천사를 보았다

sentences.original_text: Cut down the tree and destroy it.
But leave the base of the tree
and its roots in the ground.
Tie iron and bronze round it.
Then leave it in the grass.
Make him wet with dew from the sky.
Cause him to live in the fields
with the wild animals for seven years.
